description: 10 Direct Response Rules - Single Source of Truth for the Universal Brand System

permission_framework.purpose: Each DR Rule is gated through the Five Laws to prevent conversion optimization from violating 'Attention is sacred'

dr_rules.name: Always an Offer
dr_rules.principle: Every piece must have a measurable offer
dr_rules.mechanism: Creates specific, trackable action from audience
dr_rules.verification: Can you measure exactly how many people responded to this specific piece?

permission_conditions.permitted_when: Value has been delivered first; offer is a natural next step after earning attention
permission_conditions.forbidden_when: Offer precedes value delivery; asking before earning

dr_rules.name: Reason to Respond Now
dr_rules.verification: If they don't respond today, what specifically do they lose?

permission_conditions.permitted_when: Urgency is genuine (real deadline, limited capacity, actual event)
permission_conditions.forbidden_when: Urgency is manufactured (fake countdown timers, evergreen 'limited time', artificial scarcity)

dr_rules.name: Clear Instructions
dr_rules.mechanism: Disney principle - eliminate confusion to increase satisfaction
dr_rules.requirement: Tell them exactly what to do: 'Click This Button Now'
dr_rules.verification: Could a distracted reader understand exactly what action to take?

permission_conditions.permitted_when: After friction has filtered for intention; clarity serves the committed
permission_conditions.forbidden_when: Frictionless path manipulates reflex before reflection; see Friction Budget for allocation guidance

dr_rules.name: Track, Measure, Account
dr_rules.principle: Every dollar must return ≥2×. Math over magic

metrics.insight: Ad #2 may win on LTV even if worse on immediate response

dr_rules.verification: Can you trace each sale back to its source and calculate true ROI?

permission_conditions.forbidden_when: Never forbidden — this rule has no ethical conflict with the axiom

dr_rules.name: No-Cost Brand-Building
dr_rules.principle: Brand = byproduct of direct response, not separate expense
dr_rules.mechanism: Blind ads suppress response; un-brand for curiosity when needed
dr_rules.warning: Brand-building that doesn't produce measurable response is vanity spending
dr_rules.verification: Does every brand-building element also drive measurable action?

permission_conditions.permitted_when: Un-branding serves curiosity without erasing identity; brand elements serve dual purpose
permission_conditions.forbidden_when: Un-branding dilutes identity to the point of generic anonymity; efficiency erases the frame

dr_rules.name: Follow-Up
dr_rules.principle: Systematic pursuit of every lead through full sequence
dr_rules.mechanism: Plug the 5 holes where leads leak
dr_rules.sequence: Re-state offer → Stern notice → Final → Change offer
dr_rules.verification: Is every lead being contacted at least 5 times before abandonment?

permission_conditions.permitted_when: Lead has given explicit permission; follow-up continues earned conversation
permission_conditions.forbidden_when: Follow-up becomes harassment; persistence violates consent; 'stern notice' crosses into manipulation

dr_rules.name: Strong Copy
dr_rules.verification: Would a customer read this aloud to a friend with enthusiasm?

permission_conditions.permitted_when: Emotional power aligns with brand voice; strength comes from authenticity
permission_conditions.forbidden_when: Emotional manipulation replaces genuine connection; bold copy violates established voice architecture

dr_rules.name: Mail-Order Format
dr_rules.verification: Is the format battle-tested for this type of offer?

permission_conditions.permitted_when: Format serves identity; proven structure enhances rather than overrides brand architecture
permission_conditions.forbidden_when: Generic template erases brand voice; format becomes more prominent than message

dr_rules.name: Results Rule
dr_rules.principle: Test controls, embrace 'weird', math over fads
dr_rules.mechanism: Ugly that sells beats beautiful that doesn't
dr_rules.verification: Are you testing at least one element in every campaign?

permission_conditions.permitted_when: Testing doesn't compromise core identity; 'ugly winners' still pass the Paradox Gate
permission_conditions.forbidden_when: Short-term conversion destroys long-term brand integrity; 'ugly that sells' becomes 'ugly that degrades'

dr_rules.name: Discipline
dr_rules.principle: Strict diet: purge junk, plan rules, track metrics
dr_rules.mechanism: Build muscle, avoid hazards through systematic rigor
dr_rules.verification: Can you account for every dollar spent and its return?

permission_conditions.permitted_when: Always — systematic rigor enables all other permissions
permission_conditions.forbidden_when: Never forbidden — this rule is pure accountability

usage_rules.reference_by: Use semantic ID (e.g., DR_ALWAYS_OFFER) not number in all documents
usage_rules.validation_standard: Every piece of marketing must pass all 10 verification questions
usage_rules.priority: Rules 1-3 are non-negotiable foundations; Rules 4-10 are optimization layers
usage_rules.math_first: Every dollar must return ≥2×. When in doubt, measure.
usage_rules.permission_check: Before applying any rule, verify permission_conditions.permitted_when is satisfied
